short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract text from selected area on web pages or uploaded images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert images to text instantly with our online tool!

🚀 Optimise your work with our browser extension. Forget about tedious manual data entry. ‘Text from Picture’ allows you to extract information from images in a couple of clicks. Work more efficiently with anything visual - from scans to photos.

⭐ Easy to use:
1. Activate the extension and select the desired area of the image.
2. The text is automatically recognised and copied to the clipboard.
3. Paste the resulting text into any document using Cmd+V/Ctrl+V.

🌐 Ideal for students, researchers and professionals who regularly work with visual content.

👍 Extract text from any image - from infographics to social media posts.

💼 Save time when processing invoices, receipts and business documents.

🎉 A simple and effective way to convert visual information into text.

📜 Key features:
- One-click image area selection
- Accurate OCR recognition
- Automatic copying to clipboard
- Compatible with all websites
- Local processing without data transfer

🚚 Transform static images into editable content.

🔗 Easily integrate into any workflow - from blogging to website development.

📸 Advanced OCR technology for accurate text recognition on images.

🖼️ Support for all popular image formats: JPEG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, WEBP, SVG.

💻 Works with both online content and local files with appropriate settings.

📲 Universal application: from restaurant menus to billboards.

🛡️ Privacy priority: all operations are performed locally in your browser.

🔥 Enhance your toolkit today!
